text: To access the Services, Customer may be asked to provide certain registration details or other information, including without limitation, usernames and passwords required for security procedures ("Access Credentials").

Customer acknowledges and agreements that Provider may obtain and aggregate technical and other data about Customer's use of the Services, excluding any personally identifiable information ("Anonymous Data").
Provider may use aggregate information derived from Personal Data for internal business purposes, in accordance with these Terms.
Such Anonymous Data shall be retained by Provider, during the period during which Customer's has access to the Services, and after in perpetuity, for Provider's use, including, without limitation, to analyze, support, operate, and improve the Services, for research purposes, and for any business purposes, including, without limitation, product and development.
